acl.description: Access control lists used to grant read and write access.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedPostPolicy request property "acl" should be a string.
errorMessage.enum: AwsS3PresignedPostPolicy request property "acl" is not a valid value.

conditions.description: Conditions to be enforced on the request.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedPostPolicy request property "conditions" should be a array.

expires.description: Number of seconds for which the policy should be valid.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedPostPolicy request property "expires" should be a number.

key.description: Key under which object will be stored.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedPostPolicy request property "key" should be a string.
AwsS3PresignedPostPolicy request properties should be an object.
errorMessage.required: AwsS3PresignedPostPolicy request should have required property "key".
